predict_diagnosis:
1. Multiple sclerosis (MS)
2. Neuromyelitis optica (NMO)
3. Primary lateral sclerosis (PLS)
4. Motor neuron disease (MND)
5. Spinal muscular atrophy (SMA)
6. Inflammatory neuropathy (e.g., Guillain-Barré syndrome)
7. Vascular dementia due to cerebral ischemia
8. Fibromyalgia syndrome (FMS)
9. Complex regional pain syndrome (CRPS)
10. Thoracic outlet syndrome (TOS)

Please note that this list is not exhaustive, and further evaluation and testing will be necessary to narrow down the final diagnosis. The presented symptoms and findings could be related to multiple conditions, and it is essential to consider other factors such as age, medical history, and family history when assessing the patient.
